sections.1_story: Imagine you are solving a puzzle where you are given two statements and must decide what conclusions logically follow. Syllogism questions test your ability to reason logically, which is a key skill for exams.

5_exam_examples.question: Statements: All roses are flowers. All flowers are plants. Conclusions: All roses are plants.
Statements: Some apples are bananas. All bananas are fruits. Conclusions: Some apples are fruits.
Statements: All pens are pencils. No pencil is an eraser. Conclusions: No pen is an eraser.
Statements: Some dogs are cats. Some cats are rats. Conclusions: Some dogs are rats.
Statements: All books are papers. Some papers are pens. Conclusions: Some books are pens.
